rename.from: Block more classes from polymorphic deserialization (placeholder)
rename.to: Block more classes from polymorphic deserialization (CVE-2018-19360, CVE-2018-19361, CVE-2018-19362)

body:
Fix released on 23-Nov-2018, in:

* 2.7.9.5 (micro-patch of `jackson-databind`)
* 2.8.11.3 (micro-patch of `jackson-databind`, plus `jackson-bom` version `2.8.11.20181123`)

and will be included in `2.9.8` as soon as that gets released (full release along with other fixes)
Will this fix be included in 2.6.7.3, like #2097 was for 2.6.7.2?
@bbossola I don't think I will release any more 2.6.7.x micro-patches at this point, so no.
Has the 2.9.8 version been released with the fixes?
Not yet. Should be released within next week or two, definitely before end of 2018.

issue.title: Dependecy Update required

repository.name: cf-java-client
repository.description: Java Client Library for Cloud Foundry

issue.body:
Hi Team, 
the fasterXML Jackson dependecy has a couple of CVE in the currently used version. 
Fixes are present (at least for some of them).
https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2186
>    2.8.11.3 (micro-patch of jackson-databind, plus jackson-bom version 2.8.11.20181123)
https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2097
>    2.8.11.3 (micro-patch of jackson-databind, plus jackson-bom version 2.8.11.20181123 )

In the current 2.33.0.RELEASE / 3.14.0.RELEASE we have the following depedencies: 

################
2.33.0.RELEASE 
Current: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.spring.platform/platform-bom/Brussels-SR14 > Jackson Databind 2.8.11.2
Could be updated to SR15 would contain the mentioend version 2.8.11.3 > 
https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.spring.platform/platform-bom/Brussels-SR15
################
3.14.0.RELEASE > spring-boot-dependencies:2.0.5.RELEASE 
Fix for FasterXML was released 3 days ago and is not yet reflected in the spring-boot-dependencies: 
https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson/wiki/Jackson-Release-2.9.8 on https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework.boot/spring-boot-dependencies 
So this would need some more cross checking.
Its available at: https://search.maven.org/artifact/com.fasterxml.jackson.core/jackson-databind/2.9.8/bundle
################

Cold you please let me know how is the  common process and timelines for such security related dependency updates?
Thanks Tom!

issue.title: Release 2.2.6

repository.name: git-commit-id-maven-plugin
repository.description: Maven plugin which includes build-time git repository information into an POJO / *.properties). Make your apps tell you which version exactly they were built from! Priceless in large distributed deployments... :-)

license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0

issue.body:
This tracks the (unplaned) release for 2.2.6

# General scope of the new release:
update jackson-databind to v2.9.8 in response to https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2186 (CVE-2018-19360, CVE-2018-19361, CVE-2018-19362)

# Release-Guide
see http://central.sonatype.org/pages/ossrh-guide.html

- [x] update dependencies `mvn versions:display-dependency-updates`
- [x] wait for travis checks to pass
- [x] `mvn release:prepare`
[INFO] Checking dependencies and plugins for snapshots ...
What is the release version for "Git Commit Id Maven Plugin"? (pl.project13.maven:git-commit-id-plugin) 2.2.6: [ENTER]
What is SCM release tag or label for "Git Commit Id Maven Plugin"? (pl.project13.maven:git-commit-id-plugin) git-commit-id-plugin-2.2.6: **v3.0.0** [ENTER]
What is the new development version for "Git Commit Id Maven Plugin"? (pl.project13.maven:git-commit-id-plugin) 2.2.7-SNAPSHOT: [ENTER]


- [x] wait for travis checks to pass
- [x] `mvn release:perform`
- [x] then go to oss.sonatype.org log in there and go to the staging repositories, there will be the plugin, you have to first close and then release it if validation passed.
- [x] close old milestone
- [x] create new milestone for new version
- [x] publish Release-Notes

issue.title: Upgrade jackson to 2.9.8 to address CVE-2018-19360 & related CVEs
issue.body:
Upgrade jackson to address CVE
2.9.8 appears to contain a fix - see https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2186
Signed-off-by: Nigel Jones <nigel.l.jones+git@gmail.com>
